sentences.english: Schunck and Betta were my friend, too. Their story are widespread.
sentences.chinese: 舒克和贝塔也是我的朋友，他俩的经历流传甚广。
那么列得贝塔法案重要吗？

sentences.english: Alphas, Betas , and Logans were deployed to their appointed places.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔法机，贝塔机，摇石机也安排到了指定位置。

sentences.english: Tau and beta-amyloid are both proteins associated with the disease.
sentences.chinese: Tau和贝塔淀粉样蛋白质都与此症有关。

sentences.english: Sheldon: Look at the beta function of quantum chromodynamics. The signs' been changed.
sentences.chinese: 看看量子色动力学的贝塔函数，符号被改掉了。

sentences.english: Knopf Books for Young Readers, a division of Random House, which is owned by Germanys Bertelsmann AG.
sentences.chinese: 兰登书屋目前为德国贝塔斯曼集团所有。

sentences.english: A rare tumor (usually benign) derived from beta cells is called insulinoma. It results in recurrent and prolonged attacks of hypoglycemia.
sentences.chinese: 贝塔细胞的什么罕见的良性肿瘤会导致低血糖。

sentences.english: The Court did not deny that Ledbetter had been discriminated against.
sentences.chinese: 法院没有否认列得贝塔受到歧视。

sentences.english: Of those three the Net will be the trickiest to master.
sentences.chinese: 上述三张网将成为贝塔斯曼最精彩的篇章。

sentences.english: But Ledbetter just wanted what she was entitled to—equal pay for the same job.
sentences.chinese: 然而列得贝塔仅仅实现做同样工作有权得到同等待遇。

definition: Snow (name)/Edgar Snow (1905-1972), American journalist, reported from China 1928-1941, author of Red Star Over China
Gore (name)/Al Gore (1948-), US vice-president 1993-2001 under Bill Clinton, subsequently environmental campaigner and Nobel Peace laureate
Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
